name: Manas
message: Hello this is manas. I was Exun 95-2001. I went to NSIT Delhi and then to grad school at MIT Media Lab and was a PhD student at UC Berkeley CS. I work at Uber where I lead our advertising and membership products.

name: Madhav Narayan
message: Hi there! Iâ€™m Madhav from the batch of 2015. Barely an Exun member, my stint last around two months (joined at the end of 12th, Exun (e)Lite?), but I have fond memories of the many member friends and seniors who supported and included me in all the fun tech stuff throughout. Recently moved to London where I work as a software engineer. Excited to meet you all virtually and in person sometime!

name: Rudraneel Sinha

Currently a CS major at Purdue doing research on finding GPU architectural optimisations for differentially private ML. Excited to be a part of this group, many memories with the club!

name: Ananay Arora
message: Hi everyone! I'm Ananay - President, Class of 2016-17. I'm currently working at Legix as a founding engineer based in Phoenix, AZ. Fun fact - I love to DJ as a hobby. Looking forward to meeting you all!

name: Bharat Kashyap
message: Thanks Ankit for taking the lead on this! I'm Bharat, President in 2015. Engineer in open-source dev tools currently, worked in tech for consulting before this. Very excited to have the alumni group going :)

name: Jawahar
message: Exun 2000 Vice President along with Ankit. These days, I work on incubating newer business within larger companies, currently in media and streaming, previously Samsung. Maryland/Stern alum (and IIT dropout?) Residing in the NYC area. Always happy to connect

name: Ankit Wadhwa
message: Exun 2000, President - now an entrepreneur, having built and exited two sizable tech companies. Currently working on my third venture in crypto. I spent 7 years in consulting before transitioning to entrepreneurship. I'm an IIT/Wharton alum and a proud father of a 5-year-old. Always happy to connectâ€”feel free to reach out!
